data.text: Puerto Rico ain’t playing you can’t get in nowhere without a vaccination card or negative Covid test 🔥🔥😂

I understand that to go to Puerto Rico you can pay a $300 fine instead of following any of the covid restrictions like showing proof of vaccination and if you don't pay the fine they request a ton of information. I guess only people who can afford the $300 fine are welcome there?

Here in Puerto Rico due to the governors tyrannical orders I am now required to show vaccination proof to even buy ice cream. It’s crazy. I’d I don’t show it I can’t buy. That’s insane. This is the new America. #USA
At this point I'm pretty sure Puerto Rico will be the last place on earth to get rid of vaccination and mask mandates.
In Puerto Rico you gotta show your vaccine to get in restaurants. If we had to do that stateside it would be Civil war.
i wanna go back to Puerto Rico but you gotta have the vaccine to get in 😒

Conspiracy theories:
1. Man landed on the moon with 1960s technology
2. The twin towers crumble did not look like controlled demolition
3. Hussein had WMD
4. Joe Biden got 81 million votes
5. Michelle Obama is a woman
6. Covid vaccine is effective
7. Puerto Rico is a country
